dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: President Tokayev is heading to Hungary again, this time for the Organization of Turkic States summit on May 20th and 21st.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it sounds like things went really well. He met with both Prime Minister Orban and President Sulyok in Budapest.
